Contents.Name: Torches (10)
Contents.Description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

Contents.Name: Rations (1 day)
Contents.Description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

Contents.Name: 50 feet of Hempen Rope
Contents.Description: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.
